sentences.english: At present, hospitals continue to operate on a fee-per-service model.
sentences.chinese: 目前，医院继续采取服务收费的运作模式。

sentences.english: SETTING Department of Operation Surgery Union Hospital Affiliated to Tongji Medical College of Huazhong University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 华中科技大学同济医学院附属协和医院手外科。

sentences.english: When the police arrived, they sent Chen to hospital. After intensive rescue, Chen is still in coma.
sentences.chinese: 经医院抢救，陈勇军目前仍处于昏迷之中。

sentences.english: Hello. This is the Yanhua Fenghuang Hospital. May I see your passport please.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是燕化凤凰医院，请出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Communicate with orphanage directors and hospital staff.
sentences.chinese: 与儿童福利院院长及医院职员联络。

sentences.english: He died on the way to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 后来他还是死在了去医院的路上。

sentences.english: On October 12 two sick children arrived at the hospital in a vehicle from a nomad encampment.
sentences.chinese: 在10月12日有两名患病儿童从牧区乘车来到医院。

sentences.english: Another 9-year old girl died after being admitted to hospital.
sentences.chinese: 另外一名年仅9岁的小女孩在被送入医院后不治。

sentences.english: These hospitals are required to install the hardware and software to process smart-card transactions.
sentences.chinese: 要求这些医院安装处理智能卡交易的硬件和软件。

sentences.english: The hospital has three hundred beds.
Analysis of risk factors for nosocomial infection of urologic al surgical department.
sentences.chinese: 泌尿外科医院感染危险因素分析。

sentences.english: I had to go to hospital to have my nose cauterised and treated.
sentences.chinese: 我以前曾经去医院治疗过鼻子。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the administration pattern of the hospital labor personnel.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索医院工勤人员管理模式。

sentences.english: Then he presided the building of hospital and the establishing of the hygiene schools.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他主持了医院建设和卫生学校的建立。

sentences.english: Berlusconi was taken to hospital with blood smeared over his face after a man hurled a small model of Milan cathedral at him at a political rally, police said on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，他脸带血渍，被送往了医院。

sentences.english: The boss in whose company Mr. Kang worked called at the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 老板到医院拜访了康先生，康先生在他的公司里工作。

definition: to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
to transfer (a patient) to a different hospital/to transfer to hospital (e.g. a prisoner)
to leave hospital/to be discharged from hospital
to receive hospital treatment/to be hospitalized
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
department of gynecology and obstetrics/birth clinic
